doc:
Charley Foy https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charley_Foy 0 Charley Foy (June 12, 1898 – August 22, 1984) was an American actor of both the vaudeville stage and film. Son of Eddie Foy Sr., he was one of the famous "The Seven Little Foys", the seven children of the senior Foy, who joined him on stage in vaudeville. After beginning his career in Vaudeville, he had a film career which spanned 40 years, although he was only truly active for only seven of them, from 1936 through 1943. Charley_Foy ( June_12_,_1898 – August_22_,_1984 ) was an_American_actor of both the_vaudeville_stage_and_film . Son of Eddie_Foy_Sr. , he was one of the_famous " The_Seven_Little_Foys " , the_seven_children of the_senior_Foy , who joined him on stage in vaudeville . After beginning his_career in Vaudeville , he had a_film_career which spanned 40_years , although he was only truly_active for only_seven of them , from 1936 through 1943 .
